description.value:
Sigils and runes of ancient and powerful magic cover the iron cladding on this long wooden staff. A staff of the magi is a +3 major striking staff, and when wielding it you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells.

Voluntarily destroying a staff of the magi unleashes a truly devastating wave of arcane energy that surges out, dissipating with distance. When wielding the staff, you can break it using an Interact action. This releases a 30-foot-burst magical explosion centered on the staff. This deals [[/r 2d10]] force damage per charge remaining in the staff (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true]), You automatically critically fail your save. The explosion continues to echo beyond the initial blast zone, dealing half as much damage to creatures beyond 30 feet but within a @Template[type:burst|distance:60]. A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies instantly; this is a death effect.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.
